name: Create Images from Text Prompts using Flux Kontext Pro and Replicate

user.name: Yaron Been
user.bio:
Building AI Agents and Automations | Growth Marketer | Entrepreneur | Book Author & Podcast Host

If you need any help with Automations, feel free to reach out via linkedin:
https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/

And check out my Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos

description:
This workflow provides automated access to the Black Forest Labs Flux Kontext Pro AI model through the Replicate API. It saves you time by eliminating the need to manually interact with AI models and provides a seamless integration for image generation tasks within your n8n automation workflows.

## Overview

This workflow automatically handles the complete image generation process using the Black Forest Labs Flux Kontext Pro model. It manages API authentication, parameter configuration, request processing, and result retrieval with built-in error handling and retry logic for reliable automation.

**Model Description**: A state-of-the-art text-based image editing model that delivers high-quality outputs with excellent prompt following and consistent results for transforming images through natural language

## Key Capabilities

- **High-quality image generation from text prompts**
- **Advanced AI-powered visual content creation**
- **Customizable image parameters and styles**

## Tools Used

- **n8n**: The automation platform that orchestrates the workflow
- **Replicate API**: Access to the Black Forest Labs/flux-kontext-pro AI model
- **Black Forest Labs Flux Kontext Pro**: The core AI model for image generation
- **Built-in Error Handling**: Automatic retry logic and comprehensive error management

## How to Install

1. **Import the Workflow**: Download the .json file and import it into your n8n instance
2. **Configure Replicate API**: Add your Replicate API token to the 'Set API Token' node
3. **Customize Parameters**: Adjust the model parameters in the 'Set Image Parameters' node
4. **Test the Workflow**: Run the workflow with your desired inputs
5. **Integrate**: Connect this workflow to your existing automation pipelines

## Use Cases

- **Content Creation**: Generate unique images for blogs, social media, and marketing materials
- **Design Prototyping**: Create visual concepts and mockups for design projects
- **Art & Creativity**: Produce artistic images for personal or commercial use
- **Marketing Materials**: Generate eye-catching visuals for campaigns and advertisements

## Connect with Me

- **Website**: https://www.nofluff.online
- **YouTube**: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
- **LinkedIn**: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
- **Get Replicate API**: https://replicate.com (Sign up to access powerful AI models)

#n8n #automation #ai #replicate #aiautomation #workflow #nocode #imagegeneration #aiart #texttoimage #visualcontent #aiimages #generativeart #flux #machinelearning #artificialintelligence #aitools #automation #digitalart #contentcreation #productivity #innovation

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

assignments.name: prompt
assignments.value: A beautiful landscape with mountains and a lake at sunset

assignments.name: response
assignments.value: ={{ { success: true, image_url: $json.output, prediction_id: $json.id, status: $json.status, message: 'Image generated successfully' } }}

assignments.name: response
assignments.value: ={{ { success: false, error: $json.error || 'Image generation failed', prediction_id: $json.id, status: $json.status, message: 'Failed to generate image' } }}

parameters.content:
=======================================
        FLUX-KONTEXT-PRO GENERATOR
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

## ü§ñ **BLACK-FOREST-LABS/FLUX-KONTEXT-PRO - IMAGE GENERATION WORKFLOW**

**üî• Powered by Replicate API and n8n Automation**

---

### üìù **Model Overview**

- **Owner**: black-forest-labs
- **Model**: flux-kontext-pro
- **Type**: Image Generation
- **API Endpoint**: https://api.replicate.com/v1/predictions

**üéØ What This Model Does:**
A state-of-the-art text-based image editing model that delivers high-quality outputs with excellent prompt following and consistent results for transforming images through natural language

---

### üìã **Parameter Reference**

**üî¥ Required Parameters:** prompt
**üîµ Optional Parameters:** seed, input_image, aspect_ratio, output_format, safety_tolerance, prompt_upsampling

**üìñ Detailed Parameter Guide:**
- **seed** (integer): Random seed. Set for reproducible generation
- **prompt** (string): Text description of what you want to generate, or the instruction on how to edit the given image.
- **input_image** (string): Image to use as reference. Must be jpeg, png, gif, or webp.
- **aspect_ratio** (string): Aspect ratio of the generated image. Use 'match_input_image' to match the aspect ratio of the inp... (Default: match_input_image)
- **output_format** (string): Output format for the generated image (Default: png)
- **safety_tolerance** (integer): Safety tolerance, 0 is most strict and 6 is most permissive. 2 is currently the maximum allowed w... (Default: 2)
- **prompt_upsampling** (boolean): Automatic prompt improvement (Default: False)

---

### üîß **Workflow Components Explained**

**üéØ Manual Trigger**
- Starts the workflow execution
- Click to begin image generation process

**üîê Set API Token** 
- Configures your Replicate API authentication
- Replace 'YOUR_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN' with your actual token
- Essential for accessing the black-forest-labs/flux-kontext-pro model

**‚öôÔ∏è Set Image Parameters**
- Configures all input parameters for the model
- Includes both required and optional parameters
- Pre-filled with sensible defaults for testing

**üöÄ Create Image Prediction**
- Sends the generation request to Replicate API
- Uses the image parameters you configured
- Returns a prediction ID for status tracking

**‚è≥ Wait & Status Checking Loop**
- Waits 5 seconds then checks prediction status
- Continues checking until completion or failure
- Implements intelligent retry logic with 10-second delays

**‚úÖ Success/Error Handling**
- Routes successful completions to success response
- Handles failures gracefully with error details
- Returns structured JSON response with URLs/errors

**üìä Logging & Monitoring**
- Logs all requests for debugging and monitoring
- Tracks timestamps and prediction IDs
- Helps identify issues during development

---

### üåü **Key Benefits**

- **üé® Instant Image Generation**: Transform ideas into images using state-of-the-art AI
- **üîÑ Automated Workflow**: Handles the complete generation pipeline automatically
- **üõ°Ô∏è Error Resilience**: Built-in retry logic and comprehensive error handling
- **üìà Production Ready**: Includes logging, monitoring, and structured responses
- **üîß Customizable**: Easy to modify parameters and extend functionality
- **‚ö° Efficient Processing**: Optimized API calls with intelligent status checking

---

### üöÄ **Quick Start Instructions**

1. **üîë Get Your API Key**
   - Sign up at https://replicate.com
   - Navigate to your account settings
   - Copy your API token

2. **üîß Configure the Workflow**
   - Replace 'YOUR_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN' with your actual token
   - Adjust parameters in the 'Set Image Parameters' node
   - Customize the prompt or other inputs as needed

3. **‚ñ∂Ô∏è Execute the Workflow**
   - Click the 'Manual Trigger' to start
   - Monitor the execution in the n8n interface
   - Check logs for detailed execution information

4. **üì• Get Your Results**
   - Successful generations return a URL to your image
   - Download or use the generated content as needed
   - Results are available immediately upon completion

---

### üîç **Troubleshooting Guide**

**Common Issues:**
- **Invalid API Token**: Ensure your Replicate token is valid and has sufficient credits
- **Parameter Validation**: Check that required parameters match expected types
- **Generation Timeout**: Some images take longer - monitor the logs
- **Output Format**: Verify the model returns the expected output format

**Best Practices:**
- Test with default parameters first
- Monitor your Replicate usage and billing
- Keep API tokens secure and never commit them to code
- Use appropriate parameter values for your use case

---

**üîó Additional Resources:**
- Model Documentation: https://replicate.com/black-forest-labs/flux-kontext-pro
- Replicate API Docs: https://replicate.com/docs
- n8n Documentation: https://docs.n8n.io

---
